title: HexoCity
description:
Hexocity is a relaxing puzzle game set up in a futuristic world. Inspired by the great “Dorfromantik” we have decided to make this game to build our team with a limit of 6 months of development. Build your archipelago while listening to relaxing synthwave music. MACHI KORO With Everyone
Hexocity is a relaxing puzzle game where you place hexagonal tiles and win points by connecting the same elements. You start with a limited number of tiles and the game ends when you reach 0. Some features will allow you to win more tiles so you can extend the game duration .

system_requirements.Graphics: NVIDIA 900 series or higher, or AMD RX-300 series or higher
